title: Admission, Discharge, and Transfer
description: The ADT transaction set provides for transmitting new or updated demographic and visit information about patients.  Since virtually any system attached to the network requires information about patients, it is one of the most commonly used transaction sets. Generally, information is entered into an ADT system and passed to the nursing, ancillary and financial systems either in the form of an unsolicited update or in response to a record - oriented query. This chapter defines the transactions at the seventh level, i.e., the abstract messages.The examples included in this chapter were constructed using the HL7 Encoding Rules
